name: NexusMods Disable Responsive Scaling Tabs
description: This style stops the Nexus Mods site from replacing the helpful tab bar with an unhelpful, baleful dropdown when zooming in on the page.
additional_info:
When you zoom in on the Nexus Mods site, it disables the tab bar and replaces it with a clunky, useless, badly designed dropdown. This is called "Responsive design," also known as "We despise the visually disabled people as they're impure and a scourge upon our world, we're going to pretend they don't exist until they're removed via eugenics." I feel responsive is a misnomer as in my experience it's always made sites less responsive.

This is my attempt to counter the bloody-minded ableist bigotry of the NexusMods site designer (who's probably a deeply unpleasant person) and make it easier for people who have to zoom the page to use. You're very welcome! I know I needed this, so I imagine others might too.
